long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you anonymize or pseudo-anonymize usernames on Hacker News.

You can select from two options:

1. Full Anonymize
  This option will change every username to "anonymous".
2. Hash names
  This option will replace usernames with a deterministic hash.
3. Reset
  This button resets the original usernames.

Code and more here: https://github.com/danthelion/anonymize-hn
